eunuchoid_skeleton.evidence: The ratio of the upper to the lower segment of the skeleton was 0.84; average for men is 0.92.

bilateral_cryptorchidism.status: treated surgically at age 6 without success

relevant_findings.acanthosis_nigricans: present at the end of high-dose testosterone treatment

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Eunuchoid body proportions became rapidly more evident after the age of 23.

acanthosis_nigricans.evidence: characterized by epidermal hyperplasia and irregular hyperkeratosis before treatment

liver_function.status: improved; liver biopsy showed improvement of liver NASH

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Height increased slightly after starting estradiol treatment.
